entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Quaqtaq
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:38 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Quaqtaq Airport 11:00 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

Pressure: 100.6 kPa
Humidity: 91 %

Dewpoint: -7.7°C

entry.title: Saturday night: Blizzard. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Blizzard developing this evening. Wind east 50 km/h gusting to 70 increasing to 70 gusting to 100 early this evening. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
